tweet.text: The Office of the Historian is excited to announce that we are joining @FSIatState! Thank you to Ambassadors Smith & Noyes and all of #FSI for the warm welcome! We look forward to many years of collaboration with the energetic and innovative people of FSI! #FRUS #twitterstorians
tweet.html: The Office of the Historian is excited to announce that we are joining @FSIatState! Thank you to Ambassadors Smith & Noyes and all of #FSI for the warm welcome! We look forward to many years of collaboration with the energetic and innovative people of FSI! #FRUS #twitterstorians
